content.rendered:
Why Choose Gutafix®?

  • Support The Gut Lining – This comprehensive formula contains plant-based natural ingredients designed to improve digestion and promote proper intestinal function with restoration of the mucosal lining integrity.
  • Gutafix® is formulated as a supplement to promote abdominal comfort, guts function and relief from multiple guts disturbances including a combination of symptoms of cramping, bowel urgency, diarrhea, constipation, bloating, and gas.
  • Good health really does start in the gut. Poor gut health can even lead to malabsorption and deficiency in essential nutrients, sometimes resulting in mood swings, depression, and other imbalances that may affect the quality of life. Maintaining good gut flora and balance is essential for proper digestive health and gut integrity. The gut wall houses many cells that comprise the body’s immune system and needs nourishment to ensure and maintain a healthy overall immune system. Gutafix® is specifically designed to aid in restoration and fixing of guts disbalances in a gentle, fast, and reliable way without any adverse effects.
  • Made from all natural organic herbs, Gutafix® is gentle and without doubt the supplement to bring you the much-needed solution to Ulcers in the gastro-intestinal tract.
  • Suitable for all types of Ulcers including but not limited to peptic ulcers, duodenal ulcer, stomach ulcers, e.t.c and promote healthy bowel function.
  • Every Gutafix® product comes from an inspected, and NAFDAC certified facility.
  • Gutafix® has been evaluated, tested and approved by the National Agency for Food and Drug Administration and Control (NAFDAC).
Download

excerpt.rendered: Solution to stomach ulcers and gut’s dysbiosis. Restores gut’s lining health naturally | 60 Capsules
